take
actions.instructions:
IA,$S,$I;
PR,You put the $S in your inventory.;

actions.name: use with
use with
use
actions.instructions: PR,You used the shower. Congratulations on being a functioning adult, nerd.;

actions.name: door

items.name: Office keys
items.description: An RFID key that allows access to your office

items.name: Stairs
items.description: They sport a heavily worn carpet and peeling gloss white ballustrade of which one of the supports is missing

items.name: Shower
items.description: It's dilapidated. The shower head slowly drips and the curtain has mildew

items.name: Toilet
items.description: Of the traditional black abd white variety. Dubious stains skirt its rim

items.name: Front door
items.description: It's a big, old front door but the lock is half hanging off. It's been that way since the immigration thing and the landlord never got around to fixing it

items.name: Shit old bike
items.description: Rusted and sad, it hangs on the wall and hasn't move since your flatmate left 6 months previously

items.name: Metro newspaper
items.description: A rather bleak publication that focusses on supporting the meta-interests of the wealthy elite

items.name: ES newspaper
items.description: Another bleak publication that focusses on supporting the meta-interests of the wealthy elite, in serif

items.name: Oyster machine
items.description: You can top up your Oyster Card here

items.name: Ticket barrier
items.description: Use your Oyster Card to travel to other places in London

items.name: Oyster card
items.description: You have $5 of credit on this card

locations.name: Bedroom
locations.description: You awake in a darkened room

locations.name: Landing
locations.description: It's cold. The bare floorboards creak as you walk

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: The bathroom is icy and it looks like the boiler's broken

locations.name: Street
locations.description: You are on a dark, grey, London street. It is raining

locations.name: Bus stop
locations.description: You arrive at a typical TFL bus stop. There is no next bus indicator

locations.name: Local tube station
locations.description: You are at a tube station somewhere on the Central Line

locations.name: Central tube station
locations.description: You are at a central tube station somewhere further from home on the Central Line. It's larger and busier and more grey than the local one

locations.name: Front entrance
locations.description: The wallpaper is damp and curling off the walls in yellow triangles around a cobwebbed gas meter
